TypeSignature.Value: public class Tuple<T1,T2,T3,T4,T5> : IComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable

.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Tuple`5<T1, T2, T3, T4, T5> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, class System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable, class System.IComparable
Public Class Tuple(Of T1, T2, T3, T4, T5) Implements IComparable, IStructuralComparable, IStructuralEquatable
generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5> public ref class Tuple : IComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable

summary.span: 表示 5 元组，或五元组。

span.span: Represents a 5-tuple, or quintuple.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元组是具有特定的数量和值序列的数据结构。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 类表示 5 元组，或 quintuple，这是具有五个组件的元组。The class represents a 5-tuple, or quintuple, which is a tuple that has five components. 可以实例化对象通过调用构造函数或静态方法。You can instantiate a object by calling either the constructor or the static method. 你可以通过使用只读的检索此元组的组件的值， ， ， ，和实例属性。You can retrieve the value of the tuple's components by using the read-only , , , , and instance properties. 元组常用四个不同的方式：Tuples are commonly used in four different ways: - 来表示一组数据。To represent a single set of data. 例如，一个元组可以表示的数据库记录，并且其组件可以表示每个字段的记录。For example, a tuple can represent a database record, and its components can represent individual fields of the record. - 若要提供轻松访问和数据集的操作。To provide easy access to, and manipulation of, a data set. 下面的示例定义一个数组这些比赛中包含的数字的它们玩的游戏和执行，数获得的总码，美国橄榄球运行备份的名称的对象和出身评分。The following example defines an array of objects that contain the names of running backs in American football, the number of games in which they played, and the number of carries, total yards gained, and touchdowns scored during those games. 数组传递给`ComputeStatistics`方法，以计算每个运行后的每个每游戏、 平均码越远，每个游戏、 平均码的执行数和每次尝试出身的平均数。The array is passed to the `ComputeStatistics` method, which calculates each running back's number of carries per game, average yards per game, average yards per carry, and average number of touchdowns per attempt. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`5.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`5.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`5.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`5.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] - 若要通过无需使用方法返回多个值`out`参数 （在 C# 中) 或`ByRef`参数 （在 Visual Basic 中)。To return multiple values from a method without the use of `out` parameters (in C#) or `ByRef` parameters (in Visual Basic). 例如，前面的示例在一个数组中返回其计算的统计信息，以及玩家的名称对象。For example, the previous example returns its computed statistics, along with the name of the player, in an array of objects. - 若要将多个值传递给通过单个参数的方法。To pass multiple values to a method through a single parameter. 例如，方法只有一个参数，你可以提供一个值，则在启动线程执行的方法。For example, the method has a single parameter that lets you supply one value to the method that the thread executes at startup. 如果你提供对象作为方法参数中，你可以提供具有五个项的数据的线程的启动例程。If you supply a object as the method argument, you can supply the thread’s startup routine with five items of data.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你还可以使用静态方法实例化 5 元组对象，而无需显式指定其组件的类型。You can also use the static method to instantiate a 5-tuple object without having to explicitly specify the types of its components. 下面的示例使用方法可实例化一个 5 元组，其中第一个元素的类型、 其剩余的四个组件的类型。The following example uses the method to instantiate a 5-tuple whose first component is of type and its remaining four components are of type . [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/create1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/create1.vb#9)] 这相当于对的以下调用类构造函数。This is equivalent to the following call to the class constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/create1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/create1.vb#10)]

param.name: obj
param.span: 与该实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示当前的 对象是否与指定对象相等。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object.

returns.span: 如果当前实例等于指定对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`参数被视为等于当前实例在下列情况下：The `obj` parameter is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是对象。It is a object. - 其五个组件是与当前实例相同的类型。Its five components are of the same types as the current instance. - 其五个组件是等于当前实例。Its five components are equal to those of the current instance. 相等性取决于每个组件的默认对象相等比较器。Equality is determined by the default object equality comparer for each component. ## Examples 下面的示例定义包含两个测试组中的患者温度相关数据的 5 元组对象的数组。The following example defines an array of 5-tuple objects that contain data about the temperatures of patients in two test groups. 数组的第一个组件提供的测试组中，数，第二到第五个组件以小时为间隔提供一个患者的温度。The first component of the array provides the number of the test group, and the second through fifth components provide the temperatures of a patient at hourly intervals. 调用方法来比较每个与每个其他对象对象。The method is called to compare every object with every other object. 输出阐释了方法返回`true`仅当所有五个组件的对象具有相等的值。The output illustrates that the method returns `true` only when all five components of the objects have equal values. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`5.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`5.equals/cs/equals1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`5.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`5.equals/vb/equals1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the current object's first component.

value.span: 当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: The value of the current object's first component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以动态确定的一种组件在两种方式之一：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过调用`GetType`方法返回的值属性。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索对象，表示对象，并返回对数组中检索的第一个元素其方法。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the first element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个数组其组件包含在美国、 它的人口数量在 1990年和 2000年、 10 年内其州的人口变化和人口的百分比变化状态的名称的对象。The following example defines an array of objects whose components contain the name of a state in the United States, its population in 1990 and 2000, its population change in this 10-year period, and the percentage change in its population. 然后循环访问数组，并显示元组中的每个分量的值。It then iterates through the array and displays the value of each component in a tuple. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`5.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`5.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`5.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`5.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: int IStructuralComparable.CompareTo (object other, System.Collections.IComparer comparer);
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo(object other, class System.Collections.IComparer comparer) cil managed
Function CompareTo (other As Object, comparer As IComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralComparable.CompareTo
virtual int System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo(System::Object ^ other, System::Collections::IComparer ^ comparer) = System::Collections::IStructuralComparable::CompareTo;

param.name: other
param.span: 要与当前实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: An object to compare with the current instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 提供用于比较的自定义规则的对象。

span.span: An object that provides custom rules for comparison.

summary.span: 使用指定的比较器将当前的 对象与指定对象进行比较，并返回一个整数，该整数指示当前对象在排序顺序中的位置是在指定对象之前、之后还是与其相同。

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object by using a specified comparer and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 一个带符号整数，指示此实例和 在排序顺序中的相对位置，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.

span.description: 此实例在排序顺序中的位置与 相同。
This instance and have the same position in the sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 虽然可以直接调用此方法，它通常由集合排序方法包括参数集合的成员进行排序。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection-sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection. 例如，它由方法和方法通过实例化的对象构造函数。For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 不是时应使用的比较的主要用途是确定两个对象是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等，请调用方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的数组包含跑卫的美国职业橄榄球职位空缺的招聘统计数据的对象。The following example creates an array of objects that contain career statistical data for running backs in American professional football. 5 元组的组件包含玩家的名称，游戏数总码数获得以及出身数评分中比赛的执行或尝试，次数。The 5-tuple's components consist of the player's name, the number of games in which he played, the number of carries or attempts, the total number of yards gained, and the number of touchdowns scored. 该示例的数组未排序顺序中显示的组件的每个元组、 排序数组，，然后调用以按排序顺序显示每个元组。The example displays the components of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls to display each tuple in sorted order. 若要对数组进行排序，该示例定义了一个泛型`YardsGained`类，该类实现接口和排序按降序按其第四个组件 （码获得） 的值而不其第一个组件的对象。To sort the array, the example defines a generic `YardsGained` class that implements the interface and sorts the objects in descending order by the value of their fourth component (yards gained) rather than by their first component. 请注意，该示例不直接调用方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 隐式调用此方法数组中每个元素的方法。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`5.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`5.compareto/cs/compareto2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`5.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`5.compareto/vb/compareto2.vb#2)]

span.span: is not a object.

param.span: 与该实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object based on a specified comparison method.

returns.span: 如果当前实例等于指定对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 仅当调用实现`other`不`null`，和可以成功地强制转换 （在 C# 中) 或 （在 Visual Basic 中) 转换为对象的组件与当前实例相同的类型。The implementation is called only if `other` is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast (in C#) or converted (in Visual Basic) to a object whose components are of the same types as the current instance. 方法第一个传递值对象要进行比较实现。The method first passes the values of the objects to be compared to the implementation. 如果此方法调用返回`true`，再次调用该方法并将其传递这两个值对象。If this method call returns `true`, the method is called again and passed the values of the two objects. 此过程将继续，直到方法调用返回`false`进行比较的特定对`Item`值或两个值传递给方法。This continues until the method call returns `false` when it compares a specific pair of `Item` values, or the two values are passed to the method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个实现 `DoubleComparer` 接口的 类。The following example defines a `DoubleComparer` class that implements the interface. 该示例实例化两个对象使用的随机数生成器来填充其第二到第五个组件，将强制转换到的第一个实例接口，然后使用`DoubleComparer`测试两个对象大致相等性的对象。The example instantiates two objects by using a random number generator to populate their second through fifth components, casts the first instance to an interface, and then uses a `DoubleComparer` object to test the two objects for approximate equality. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 方法只是包装调用`comparer`对象的实现。The method simply wraps a call to the `comparer` object's implementation. 用于计算哈希代码的算法应返回相同的哈希代码的两个被认为是相等的对象。The algorithm used to compute the hash code should return the same hash code for two objects that are considered to be equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法提供实现类。This method provides the implementation for the class. 虽然可以直接调用该方法，它通常由集合排序的默认重载方法，如和、 集合的成员进行排序。Although the method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by the default overloads of collection-sorting methods, such as and , to order the members of a collection. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 不是时应使用的比较的主要用途是确定两个对象是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等，请调用方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. 方法使用的默认对象比较器来比较每个组件。The method uses the default object comparer to compare each component. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的数组包含跑卫的美国职业橄榄球职位空缺的招聘统计信息的对象。The following example creates an array of objects that contain career statistics for running backs in American professional football. 五个组件包含玩家的名称，游戏数总码数获得以及出身数评分中比赛的执行或尝试，次数。The five components consist of the player's name, the number of games in which he played, the number of carries or attempts, the total number of yards gained, and the number of touchdowns scored. 该示例的数组未排序顺序中显示的组件的每个元组、 排序数组，，然后调用以按排序顺序显示每个元组。The example displays the components of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls to display each tuple in sorted order. 该输出显示，已按名称，即第一个组件排序数组。The output shows that the array has been sorted by name, which is the first component. 请注意，该示例不直接调用方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 隐式调用此方法数组中每个元素的方法。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过此方法返回的字符串的形式 (*Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*， *Item4*， `Item5`)，其中*Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*， *Item4*，和`Item5`表示的值， ， ， ，和属性，分别。The string returned by this method takes the form (*Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*, `Item5`), where *Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*, and `Item5` represent the values of the , , , , and properties, respectively. 如果任何属性值为`null`，它会表示为。If any of the property values is `null`, it is represented as . ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example illustrates the method. 它将显示包含在美国，1990 年 2000 中，在它的人口数量状态的名称的 5 元组对象的数组 10 年内和年填充变化率其州的人口变化。It displays an array of 5-tuple objects that contain the name of a state in the United States, its population in 1990 and 2000, its population change in this 10-year period, and the annual rate of population change.
